page.title: 13Living in Walmer
page.content: I like living in Walmer because it is a quiet, small village{near the sea} and there is an adequate supply of facilities such as a small shopping centre, restaurants and a great number of pubs. I also like it because you can get to the{town and country} easily. As Walmer is near to the port of Dover you can go for an enjoyable day to France. Walmer is interesting to live in because of its{historical} features. Apart from Walmer Castle, there are several old churches which are of special interest, aswell as the castles of Deal and Dover. The disadvantages of living in Walmer are mainly that there are{few sports {facilities,}the nearest sports centre being at Dover, and there is no longer a cinema in the town. The local people are proud of their{heritage}and are a small friendly community.
